history.content:
You’ll be on the waitlist for those 2 classes even if your declare does go thru.  Won’t automatically add from what I’ve been told. You would have to drop and readd, so most of me thinks you should just wait until Phase II for those classes.  There are 3 scenarios where you might want to consider Phase I - 1) you don’t think you will be able to declare 2) the number of reserves for CS majors for the classes will fill up or 3) declaration processing won’t happen until start of school year.

----

In both of these classes, students have a reasonable chance of getting in even if they aren't CS majors. I would phase I and if still on waitlist by the time you get in the major drop and readd.

You’ll be on the waitlist for those 2 classes even if your declare does go thru.  Won’t automatically add from what I’ve been told. You would have to drop and readd, so most of me thinks you should just wait until Phase II for those classes.  There are 3 scenarios where you might want to consider Phase I - 1) you don’t think you will be able to declare 2) the number of reserves for CS majors for the classes will fill up or 3) declaration processing won’t happen until start of school year.
I'm L&S CS who will be declaring this semester. If I try to enroll in classes like CS 188 or CS 170, should I expect to be on the waitlist until my declaration form is processed?
history.subject: UD CS classes, declaring this semester
